searchFeatureType.label: Brief description: Search for related features
searchFeatureType.description: For example, if you enter the search term >step<, it also finds all findings on >staircase<

areal.label: Area
areal.description: Designation of the quarter of Elephantine

architectUnitNumber.label: Architectural unit
architectUnitNumber.description: Number of the house, name of the building or street

installationNumber.label: Installation
installationNumber.description: Number of the installation, wall etc.

stratum.label: Local stratum
stratum.description: Local stratum of the excavation area

potteryStage.label: Pottery Stage
potteryStage.description: Pottery stage of the Elephantine series

findsLeftAtTrench.label: Finds not stored in the magazines
findsLeftAtTrench.description: Finds without traces of processing that remained in the excavation area

photoNumber.label: Photos
photoNumber.description: Number of the photo in the DAI system, e.g. ELE-43-PK-0001.TIF, if necessary with attached feature number, e.g. ELE-43-PK-0004 43501C_q.TIF

featureVolume.label: Volume of the feature in litres
